SELECT m_crm_quote.id, m_crm_quote.subject, m_crm_quote.quotestage, m_crm_quote.assignUser, m_crm_quote.opportunityid, m_crm_quote.validuntil, m_crm_quote.shipping, m_crm_quote.billaccount, m_crm_quote.billcontact, m_crm_quote.shipaccount, m_crm_quote.shipcontact, m_crm_quote.billingaddress, m_crm_quote.billingcity, m_crm_quote.billingstate, m_crm_quote.billingpostalcode, m_crm_quote.billingcountry, m_crm_quote.shippingaddress, m_crm_quote.shippingcity, m_crm_quote.shippingstate, m_crm_quote.shippingpostalcode, m_crm_quote.purchaseordernum, m_crm_quote.shippingcountry, m_crm_quote.description, m_crm_quote.paymentterm, m_crm_quote.originalpodate, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) AS assignUserFullName, m_crm_opportunity.opportunityName as opportunityName, billingAccount.accountName AS billingAccountName, concat(LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(billingContact.firstname, ''), ' ')), billingContact.lastname) AS billingContactName, shippingAccount.accountName AS shippingAccountName, concat(LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(shippingContact.firstname , ''), ' ')), shippingContact.lastname) AS shippingContactName, m_crm_quote.createdTime, m_crm_quote.createdUser, m_crm_quote.lastUpdatedTime
FROM m_crm_quote LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_crm_quote.assignUser = s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_account AS billingAccount ON (m_crm_quote.billaccount = billingAccount.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_account AS shippingAccount ON (m_crm_quote.shipaccount = shippingAccount.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_contact AS billingContact ON (m_crm_quote.billcontact = billingContact.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_contact AS shippingContact ON (m_crm_quote.shipcontact = shippingContact.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_opportunity ON (m_crm_quote.opportunityid = m_crm_opportunity.id)
